Cylc users

Known users include:

  • NIWA
  • Met Office
  • Max-Planck-Institut f√ºr Meteorologie
  • Deutches Klimarechenzentrum
  • Bureau of Meteorology
  • NRL Marine Meteorology Division
  • Geophysical Fluid Dynamics Laboratory
  • Meteorological Service Singapore
  • South African Weather Service
  • National Centre for Medium Range Weather Forecasting
  • Korean Meteorological Administration
  • Centre of Excellence in Simulation of Weather and Climate in Europe

Many of these centers use cylc with Rose, a framework for managing and running meteorological suites.
